bibl.title: Shrek v. Berry. Blank Subpoena Form
bibl.note: Our transcription is based on a digital image.

org.orgName: United States District Court For The Western District of Washington Northern Division

div1.p: IN THE DISTRICT COURT OF THE FIRST JUDICIAL DISTRICT OF WASHINGTON TERRITORY HOLDING TERMS AT COLFAX IN WHITMAN COUNTY IN SAID TERRITORY.

THE PEOPLE OF THE TERRITORY OF WASHINGTON, TO LEWIS P. BERRY, SHERIFF OF WHITMAN COUNTY, GREETING:- We command you. That you have the body of Michael Shrek, by you imprisoned and detained, as it is averred, illegally, before L. B. NASH, Judge of the District Cout above entitled, at the Court Room, of said Court, on the him of 100 o'clock am on the 20th day of December AD 1888 to do and receive, what shall then and there be considered concerning the said Michael Shrek. And you have then and there this Writ.
Witness, HON. L. B. NASH, Judge of the said Court, at the Court Room thereof, in the County of Whitman, this 10th day of December, 1888.
Attest my hand and the seal of said Court, the day and yoear last above written.
Alfred H Marion Clerk. By NG Marion Deputy
